Playing with controversy

Splash! A tear fell to the floor with a clap of thunder from the distance. Shaun must overcome his fears in a game to understand his depressing real life with the help of his friend Candy. Trying to escape this magical world, he finds what he had been searching for and his life changes dramatically. You would never think that having a step father would ever turn this bad! However, with the help of his only friend and a strange creature he meets along the way, will Shaun overcome his fears? “ Playing with Controversy ” is a dark addictive adventure novel following the desperately miserable existence of an anti-social teenager. Became engrossed into this magical, fantasy, spine chilling book which will keep you on the edge of your seat. Nothing will make you put it down. Do you think Shaun will ever get out?
